lines.text: Maybe it was a suicide! Shot himself, for some reason!
...I dunno. Maybe they threatened him with a fate worse than death?
...and either way, it don't matter. Didn't we get on this theory because of that hologram?
It clearly shows Slick <c=#FF00FF>firin' away from himself.</c>
...Well, that doesn't rule out the theory- it could still have been a suicide.
We'd just need to figure out...
How he coulda fired it like that and end up in the way.
Which is what I'm askin'. And which you don't have a theory about yet.
